radiographic_examinations.findings: Calcified rounded nodular opacities projecting over the left mid lung most consistent with calcified granulomas, also seen on prior study. Left hilar calcified lymph node suggestive of prior granulomatous disease. Possible punctate right-sided calcified granulomas. Stable cardiac and mediastinal silhouettes. Better appreciation of right diaphragmatic pleural linear calcifications on prior study. Mild right basilar atelectasis. Slight blunting of the left costophrenic angle; very trace pleural effusion not excluded.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable findings noted during the examination with reference to prior imaging.
